description.ko: 돌에 새겨진 침묵의 서사, 지구의 기억이 결정체 지층 속에 보존되어 있습니다.
description.en: A silent narrative carved in stone, where the earth's memory is preserved in crystalline strata.

prompt: A subterranean cavern featuring a frozen waterfall composed of petrified salt crystals and raw earthy minerals. Intricate erosion patterns and geological strata are visible in the rock walls, showing layers of burnt orange (#D2691E) and deep slate (#2F4F4F). Micro-displacement textures for every mineral facet, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Lighting is provided by rare crystal bioluminescence, casting dramatic shadows and revealing the raw organic textures carved by eons of time.
